test_module.name: stress/stress_test_561_evacuation/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env
LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPTTIMEOUT 600 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
SET CR } SET CL {
# generic expect-lite call #CALL ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/${testCaseId}.elt IP=$env.NODE.target.default.targetIP *NOINTERACT $rt_log CALL ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/${WASSP_TC_NAME}.elt IP=$env.NODE.target.default.targetIP *NOINTERACT $rt_log
PASS
